data.name: Sneaky IT Support
data.detailed_description:
Sneaky IT Support is a simulation game where you find naughty secrets in employee computers. Find their nudes and sell them on the dark web. Every laptop has a problem you have to fix within a given time limit. If you're fast enough, you'll have time to look around for secrets. The more secrets you find, the more money you'll make.

The faster you can fix the problem, the more time you'll have to look for secrets. If you're lucky, you might even find some nudes! Some employees are good at hiding their naughty secrets, though, so you'll have to be quick and clever to find them all. Use the earned money to upgrade your IT equipment.

Features:

- File browser to look through employee computers.
- Photo gallery to ogle the nudes you've found
- Ability to sell the nudes on dark web.
- Hilarious computer problems to solve with little time to solve them.

Gameplay:

Every now and then an employee comes along and brings you their laptop. They usually have a virus they want removed, or another trivial problem. Your job is to help them fix the problem within a limited number of time.

The tasks are simple and the problems are very easy to fix. But that's not where the fun is. After your job is done you get to browse around in their computer and look through their stuff.

Read their chat messages and emails, and see what sort of person they are. Most importantly, look for any naughty secrets they might be hiding. Every person has a secret. Some are better at hiding them than others. You might need to install a keylogger to get their password to access certain files.

So go out there and help some employees with their computer troubles. And maybe, just maybe, you'll make a few bucks on the side.

If you're fast enough, you'll have time to look around for their naughty secrets. The more secrets you find, the more money you'll make.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64bit
  • Processor: Quad-core Intel or AMD, 2.5 GHz or faster
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64bit
  • Processor: Quad-core Intel or AMD, 2.5 GHz or faster
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

content_descriptors.notes: Contains images of sexually explicit content and nudity.
